segments.text: I see the girl, her open palm reaching up towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s innocence in her anticipation, but it feels misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is distracted, completely focused on his prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What happens when he loses his balance?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s only a matter of time before the chaos erupts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues to dry her dishes, unaware of the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to shout a warning, but instead, I just watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
